Uses of Interface
com.simiacryptus.mindseye.opt.region.TrustRegion

  • Packages that use TrustRegion 
    Package Description
    com.simiacryptus.mindseye.opt.orient  
    com.simiacryptus.mindseye.opt.region  

    • Uses of TrustRegion in com.simiacryptus.mindseye.opt.orient

      Methods in com.simiacryptus.mindseye.opt.orient that return TrustRegion 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract TrustRegion TrustRegionStrategy.getRegionPolicy(NNLayer layer)
      Gets the Trust Region for a particular Layer

    • Uses of TrustRegion in com.simiacryptus.mindseye.opt.region

      Classes in com.simiacryptus.mindseye.opt.region that implement TrustRegion 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AdaptiveTrustSphere
      This trust region uses recent position history to define an ellipsoid volume for the n+1 line search
      class  CompoundRegion
      This combination region yields the effective itersection of the trust region volumes.
      class  DistanceConstraint
      This constraint ensures that the L2 magnitude of the weight delta cannot exceed a simple threshold.
      class  GrowthSphere
      This trust region restricts a weight vector so that it cannot increase in L2 magnitude beyond a certian amount each iteration.
      class  LinearSumConstraint
      This constrains a weight vector based on a single hyperplane which prevents immediate increases to the L1 magnitude.
      class  MeanVarianceGradient
      This highly-constrained region allows ONLY changes to the mean/stddev of the weight vector components.
      class  ProportionalityConstraint
      This strict region allows only raw scaling of weights; it is similar to but more constrained than MeanVarianceGradient
      class  SingleOrthant
      A Single-orthant trust region.
      class  StaticConstraint
      This type of trust region prevents any change the the given weight vector.
      Methods in com.simiacryptus.mindseye.opt.region that return TrustRegion 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TrustRegion LayerTrustRegionMap.getDefaultRegionPolicy()
      Gets default region policy.
